EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1331054079.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up (1331054079.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Rod, That’s great to hear! The next steps will be for you to complete the enrollment in the MBO system, as well as for us to work with Bronson to get a contract and SOW in place. I will email you a link to enroll and you will just follow that link and complete the online paperwork. At the end of the enrollment process there is an enrollment packed that has an I9 form in it. You will need to print this off and take it to a local notary for them to witness your signature and sign as an authorized representative. You will then need to fax or email that back to me. If you use an ID from the “A” column on the I9 I will need a picture copy of that as well. Below are our standard agreement and blanket SOW that you can send to Bronson to see if they will just sign our agreement. If they will not please have them reach out to me and I would be happy to take a look at their agreement. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf">http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf You may also send me the contact information for the person at Bronson that I will be reaching out to and I would be happy to send them this information directly with a brief explanation of our program to get the process started. Please let me know if you have any additional questions and I would be happy to reach out to you directly. Thank you,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Rod Sarbo [mailto:rdsarbo@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, March 06, 2012 10:57 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Follow Up Hi Nicolette, It looks like Bronson is finally ready to move forward with allowing me to convert to MBO Partners. So, let's get going with the 'paper work'. Please let me know what the next steps are. Regards, Rod Sarbo269-217-5250 On Mon, Feb 13, 2012 at 12:29 PM, Nicolette Taylor <postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear Rod, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners. I know you had expressed interest in using our services. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you. Regards, Nicolette Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
